message: Starting daemon script review - reading resource_cleanup_daemon.sh

Review complete. Comprehensive DAEMON_REVIEW.md created (15KB) with detailed analysis. Found 5 real issues: 1 critical (zombie detection bug line 128), 2 high (race conditions, no health monitoring), 2 medium-low (JSON validation, signal handling). Verified prompt file pattern is actually correct. Script architecture is solid but has critical bugs preventing production use. Recommendation: Fix zombie detection bug, add timeouts, use Python cleanup as primary with daemon as safety net.
